definitions: the action of tying an animal with a rope or chain so as to restrict its movement

examples.text: the tethering of animals was forbidden

shortDefinitions: action of tying animal with rope

definitions: the linking of a computer or other device to a smartphone in order to connect to the internet

examples.text: tethering will cost around $30 per month, probably with some cap on the amount of data transfer allowed

shortDefinitions: linking of computer to smartphone in order to connect to internet
